item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I can resist anything except temptation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Hell isâ€”other people!" -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "L'enfer, c'est les autres." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Just because you're naked doesn't mean you're sexy. Just because you're cynical doesn't mean you're cool." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "A sense of humor...is superior to any religion so far devised." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "In the haunted house of life, art is the only stair that doesn't creak." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "This is the room where Jezebel frescoed her eyelids with history's tragic glitter" -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Shoes off in the whale! And don't try and make a break for the anus." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "There's some heinous fuckery goin' on mon." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "What I need... is a strong drink and a peer group." -- Douglas Adams
